entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 12:30 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 10 except 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or drizzle beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 10 except 6 along parts of the coast. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending before morning then cloudy. Fog. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 10 except 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 10 except 6 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
